comments.comment: Defines the LoaderProps interface, extending from ViewProps excluding 'size', to configure the Loader component.
Optional children prop to pass React nodes inside the Loader component.
Optional prop to define the color of the loader element.
Defines the type of the loader based on the LoaderType enum.
Optional prop for setting the color of the text displayed with the loader.
Determines the position of the text relative to the loader from the TextPosition enum.
Sets the size of the loader, which can be a specific pixel number or a standard Size enum.
Controls the speed of the loader's animation, using the values from the Speed enum.
Defines properties specific to the default spinner variant of the loader.
Overrides the color for the default spinner loader variant.
Defines properties for the dotted variant of the loader component.
Overrides the color for the dotted loader variant.
Defines properties for the quarter variant of the loader component.
Overrides the color for the quarter loader variant.
Defines a mapping of spinning speed labels to their respective duration in seconds for the Loader component animations.
Sets up a scale of sizes, mapping size labels to numerical values to be used for Loader component dimensions.
Specifies a mapping of spinning speed labels to numerical millisecond values, determining the speed of the Loader component's animation cycles.
Defines the Size type representing permissible sizes for the Loader component
Extra small size option for the Loader component
Small size option for the Loader component
Medium size option for the Loader component
Large size option for the Loader component
Extra large size option for the Loader component
2 times extra large size option for the Loader component
3 times extra large size option for the Loader component
4 times extra large size option for the Loader component
5 times extra large size option for the Loader component
6 times extra large size option for the Loader component
Defines the LoaderType type for different Loader visual styles
Defines the TextPosition type for text positioning relative to the Loader
Defines the Speed type representing different speed options for the Loader's animation
Defines a functional component for the default spinner animation, with customizable properties for size, speed, and color.
Initializes the rotation angle state for animating the spinner.
Sets up an effect that updates the spinner's rotation angle at a set interval determined by the speed property.
Cleans up by clearing the interval when the component unmounts or when the speed changes.
Renders an SVG simulating a rotating spinner using the angle state for rotation.
Defines a functional component for a dotted spinner animation with customizable size, speed, and color properties.
Initializes the rotation angle state used for animating the dotted spinner.
Sets up an effect to periodically update the rotation angle of the dotted spinner based on the speed property.
Defines a functional component for a quarter spinner animation, where part of the circle is dashed, with customizable size, speed, and color.
Initializes rotation angle state for the quarter spinner animation.
Sets up an effect for updating the rotation angle at intervals based on the speed, rotating the quarter circle.
The LoaderView functional component handles rendering of the loader based on type, speed, and color, and optionally includes text content.
Prepares the style object to pass down to the specific loader variant chosen.
Maps loader type strings to their respective JSX elements (spinner variations).
Renders the loader and optional text in the specified position around it using a flexible Center component.
Defines a LoaderComponent as a functional component with props defined by LoaderProps and returns the LoaderView component, passing along any received props.
Renders the LoaderView component by spreading the received props, which allows for a clean pass-through of properties.
Exports the LoaderComponent as Loader, making it available for use in other parts of the application.
